frontmatter.name: Editor
frontmatter.technologies: React . Code Mirror . HTML . CSS/SCSS . Material-UI

node.html: Created a versatile code editor for JS that runs in the browser. Allows auto-indentation, intellisense, and in-browser execution of code
Command line tool - A recursive directory/file listing program that produces a depth indented listing of folders/files
A personal website showcasing my life and passion projects. You are already here :)

chalk-webpack is a Chalk clone but specifically for the frontend. It's a plugin for webpack that allows your console.logs to appear colorful in the browser - resulting in an improved developer experience. If you are looking for your logs to standout in an abyss of logs as you develop your app, this package will help get you there!
